title: new_old_ratio
description:
📈 Summary: Most of your customers each month are new, not returning.

🔍 Key Observations:
- New customers consistently number above 2900 every month.
- Recurring customers are very few, usually below 50.
- There are small ups and downs, but new customers stay strong all year.

✅ Tip for Action: Try to keep your new customers coming back more often by giving small rewards or special offers.

title: order_by_hour
description:
📈 Summary: Orders peak early in the morning and again in the early evening.

🔍 Key Observations:
- The busiest hour is 6 AM with the most orders.
- There’s a dip in orders around midday and afternoon.
- Orders pick up again after 5 PM and stay high until around 9 PM.

✅ Tip for Action: Be ready with more food and staff for busy times at early morning and evening to serve customers faster.

title: item_order_perhour
description:
📈 Summary: Orders stay busy all week with some ups and downs at different times each day.

🔍 Key Observations:
- Most days have higher orders in the morning and evening.
- Sunday and Saturday show some of the highest order numbers, especially in the evening.
- Weekdays dip a bit in early afternoon but pick back up later.

✅ Tip for Action: Focus on staff and food prep for busy weekend evenings and keep good service on weekday mornings to catch steady orders.

title: monthly_summary
description:
📈 Summary: Your income goes up and down each month, with some months much better than others.

🔍 Key Observations:
- May is the best month with the highest income.
- October and December have the lowest income, showing a dip in sales.
- Other months have steady but smaller changes.

✅ Tip for Action: Look into what made May so good and try to copy that for slower months like October and December.

title: item_sales_breakdown
current_data: [{"item_name": "4-Piece Chicken Meal", "monthly_quantity": 15918}, {"item_name": "Chicken & Waffles", "monthly_quantity": 8552}, {"item_name": "Spicy Chicken Tenders", "monthly_quantity": 4759}, {"item_name": "Potato Wedges", "monthly_quantity": 16702}]
description:
📈 Summary: The 4-Piece Chicken Meal sells the most, while Potato Wedges lead among the sides.

🔍 Key Observations:
- Fried Chicken sales peak around May and then slowly dip.
- Potato Wedges have a big spike in May but drop sharply after.
- Chicken & Waffles and Spicy Chicken Tenders sell less and are fairly steady.

✅ Tip for Action: Focus on promoting the popular 4-Piece Chicken Meal and Potato Wedges, especially before May’s peak season.
